item.title: NYKE WINFLO 8
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: If running is a daily habit, you need support to match your speed. The Nyke Winflo 8 brings back the cushioning you love and pairs it with details like a translucent upper and Flywire technology for a snug, stable fit for long road runs.
item.content:encoded:
• Description
  • Additional Information
  • Reviews (7)
  • Delivery Information
SECURE SUPPORT FOR FAST, EVERYDAY TRAINING.

If running is a daily habit, you need support to match your speed. The Nike Winflo 8 brings back the cushioning you love and pairs it with details like a translucent upper and Flywire technology for a snug, stable fit for long road
runs.

Lightweight, Breathable Support

The upper uses translucent mesh and perforations at the forefoot for breathable comfort. The Flywire cables work with the laces to provide more support as you tighten them.

Cushioning For Your Miles

A Zoom Air unit in the forefoot puts cushioning where you need it. Cushlon foam makes it soft and responsive and puts more springiness in your step.

Comfort Where It Counts

Foam around the heel and ankle combines with support at the base of the heel for a secure fit.

More Benefits
  • Overlays at the toe add a layer of durability.
  • The tongue is connected to the upper’s inner lining for a secure feel.
  • Colour Shown: White/Bright Crimson/Total Orange/Black
  • Style: CW3419-100
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

item.title: NYKE AIR ZOOM PEGASUS 38 LIMITED EDITION
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Your workhorse with wings returns.The Nyke Air Zoom Pegasus 38 continues to put a spring in your step, using the same responsive foam as its predecessor.Mesh in the upper combines the comfort and durability you want with a fit that nods back to the classic Peg.This special edition features multiple colours coming together to celebrate the Pegasus legacy.
item.content:encoded:
RESPONSIVE TRAINING WITH THE RIGHT FIT AND FEEL.

Your workhorse with wings returns.The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 continues to put a spring in your step, using the same responsive foam as its predecessor.Mesh in the upper combines the comfort and durability you want with a fit that
nods back to the classic Peg.This special edition features multiple colours coming together to celebrate the Pegasus legacy.

A Colourful Celebration

This exclusive version of the Pegasus 38 features a mix of colourways on one shoe.It celebrates the diverse spectrum and history of the Pegasus.

Something Old, Something New

A wider forefoot means more space for your toes, while the shoe’s fit maintains the comfortable feel you expect from the Pegasus.Mesh in the upper provides a breathable and plush sensation that stretches with your foot for optimal
shape and fit.

Spring With Your Step

Nike React foam is lightweight, springy and durable.More foam means better cushioning without extra bulk.We tuned the forefoot Zoom Air unit to feel softer and give you more bounce with every step.It’s closer to your foot for a
responsive sensation.

Secure Fit

Midfoot webbing tightens around your foot when you lace up, letting you choose your fit and feel.

More Benefits
  • Foam tongue helps reduce lace pressure on the top of your foot.
  • Colour Shown: Dark Smoke Grey/White/Flash Crimson/Volt
  • Style: DJ3129-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

Day hikes, thru hikes, travel or using them traditionally you will love these shoes. Spring summer, fall or winter we have shoes that will fit some and even all conditions! Running on trails these shoes offer lightweight and tackle rough trails, alpine, rocky dusty, muddy trails, snowy trails. Technical climbs and descents these shoes will be stable, rugged and durable. We have compiled this list from REAL testing in the pasific northwest and believe these are the best trail runners money can buy in 2021. These are so popular that ALL are available in both men and women’s models.

item.title: NYKE AIR ZOOM G.T.RUN
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Feel fresh.Hustle hard.The Nyke Air Zoom G.T.Run is designed for players who can do it all on court and need their shoes to keep up.Its cushioning system is stacked with 2 Zoom Air units plus 2 layers of Nike React foam.Ultralight and extra supportive in key areas, it provides a snug, consistent fit and a responsive feel to help you get the most out of your energy and outlast the competition.
item.content:encoded:
INTENSE ENERGY RETURN TO GO ALL GAME.

Feel fresh.Hustle hard.The Nyke Air Zoom G.T.Run is designed for players who can do it all on court and need their shoes to keep up.Its cushioning system is stacked with 2 Zoom Air units plus 2 layers of Nike React foam.Ultralight
and extra supportive in key areas, it provides a snug, consistent fit and a responsive feel to help you get the most out of your energy and outlast the competition.

Multi-layered Cushioning to Move with Momentum

Right under your foot is a React foam sockliner, and below that a Zoom Air unit that covers most of the forefoot.Both are stacked over a full-length React foam footbed and another forefoot Zoom Air unit.Altogether, they deliver
incredible energy return to help you go all game long.

Containment Through Comfort

The 2-layer upper is made from lightweight material that’s got haptic print details for durability.It’s breathable with a broken-in feel.

Multi-directional Micro-Grip

The thin rubber outsole has curvy ridges that bend and flex to provide traction in multiple directions.The rubber is cut away under the arch and perforated to help reduce weight.

More Benefits
  • The visible midsole is lightweight, durable Nike React foam.
  • The foam tongue moulds to your foot to help provide comfort from lace pressure.
  • A padded, mid-high collar provides comfort and support around the ankle without sacrificing agility.
Product Details
  • Heel pull tab
  • TPU midsole insert
  • Colour Shown: Black/Hyper Crimson/Vapour Green/Ghost
  • Style: CZ0202-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: China
Greater Than Series: Creating the Next Era of Basketball

The future of basketball is positionless, faster and more efficient.Players have to cut quicker, run faster and jump higher than ever to create the separation they’ll need to compete at a high level.By precisely engineering the fit,
ride and traction, Nyke Basketball’s Greater Than series aims to deliver measurable benefits to athletes who use their quickness, speed or vertical ability to gain an edge and go beyond what’s thought possible.
